name: TOO MANY BOXES!
description:
TOO MANY BOXES! - v.1.0.0

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Drag the character and avoid the boxes. 

Don't touch the spikes!!!

---------------------------------

CREATED WITH CONSTRUCT 2 FREE VERSION
